title: Entomology
description:
Insects and other related terrestrial arthropod groups are  the most diverse forms of life on earth. Insects are ideal models for studies in evolution, ecology, behaviour and the environment as the same body plan has been adapted to
diverse functions, in almost all terrestrial environments, and in most human endeavour. This module will equip students with knowledge in insect  dentification, phylogeny, ecology, beneficial and pestiferous interactions with
humans, and methods for their control.
